dmca.title: software piracy on your servers part3
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx

Legal Response Team

-----Original Message-----
From: Spider Horn [mailto:spiderhorn2006@yahoo.com] 
Posted At: Tuesday, October 31, 2006 1:40 AM
Posted To: DMCA Houston
Conversation: software piracy on your servers part3
Subject: software piracy on your servers part3


i'm going to report YOU to MICROSOFT (microsoft.com), Business Software
Alliance (BSA www.bsa.org), FBI and others.. I'l let them to deal with
you.

(regarding to software piracy on your servers at AMSTEL2003.NET)


--- DMCA Houston <DMCAHouston@theplanet.com> wrote:

>  To Whom It May Concern:
> 
> Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does 
> not substantially comply with the required notification elements of 
> the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").
